com.adobe.cq.commerce.common

Interface CommerceSearchProvider


  • public interface CommerceSearchProvider
    The CommerceSearchProvider is the common interface of search providers for the e-commerce system. A search provider implements the backend of the search system and can be plugged into the e-commerce system to provide search functionality tailored to the special needs of a certain application domain.
    See Also:
    AbstractJcrCommerceService.getSearchProvider()

      Fields

      static java.lang.String NAME_PROPERTY
      Property name for the 'name' property of a CommerceSearchProvider service.

        CommerceResult search(CommerceQuery query,
                      CommerceService service)
               throws CommerceException
        Perform a search.
        Parameters:

        service - the commerce service requesting the search
        Returns:
        a the search results as a CommerceResult
        Throws:
        CommerceException - if an error occurs during the search process.
